name: Disconnection
description:
Your job is to pilot a lone recovery rovers on abandoned spacecrafts, hoping to find evidence why they were initially destroyed.

Hey all it's colorplease here. Thanks for checking out Disconnection. This is my submission for the OST Jam Vol. 2. I hope you enjoy it! I spent quite a bit of time since going solo is kinda difficult.

--MUSIC USED--

05 - Bronson Coleman - onlineClasses (used in tutorial and end screen)

08 - Track - Orbital Entanglement (used in main game)

09 - HaruMKT - Entropeace (used in title screen) 

 56 - Lucas Dicus - You Gotta Blow In It, Dude! (used in tutorial)

Update #1: bug fixes.
